step_original: Other certificates: Attestation of equivalence as mentioned in Regulation (EC) No 1295/2008 (OJ L 340)
step_description: You must have an Attestation of Equivalence from an authorised agency in the country your goods come from.
step_howto_description: This is a certificate that shows the hops (or hop products) you're importing are the same as or better than those harvested or made in the UK.
